title: New Customer - FirstNet for First Responder
description: A first responder (e.g., paramedic, firefighter) wants to sign up for a specialized FirstNet plan.

tasks.description: Explain the benefits of the FirstNet plan, including network priority and preemption.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent clearly explains the unique features.

tasks.description: Verify the customer's status as a first responder using a verification portal.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent guides the customer through the verification process.

tasks.description: Create the new account and process the order for the FirstNet plan.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully creates the specialized account.
